DDL_TABLE_QUERY_TEMPLATE: CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `$$db`.`$$table_name` ($$columns) $$partition STORED AS `PARQUET` LOCATION '$$target_table_location'
DDL_VIEW_QUERY_TEMPLATE: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS $$db.$$view_name_full;CREATE VIEW $$db.$$view_name_full as Select * from $$staging_db.$$staging_table_name;DROP VIEW IF EXISTS $$db.$$view_name_latest;CREATE VIEW $$db.$$view_name_latest as Select * from $$staging_db.$$staging_table_name where pt_batch_id = '$$latest_batch_id'
